title: Festivals
description: Experience the vibrant colors and rhythms of Indian festivals like Diwali, Holi, and Navratri. Join locals in traditional celebrations filled with music, dance, and delicious food.

title: Cuisine
description: Delight your taste buds with India's diverse cuisine, from aromatic curries to savory street food. Don't miss trying local specialties like butter chicken, dosa, biryani, and sweets like gulab jamun.

title: Arts and Crafts
description: Explore India's rich artistic heritage through intricate handicrafts, traditional dances like Bharatanatyam and Kathak, and ancient art forms like Madhubani paintings and Tanjore art.
